page.lettertext:
fol.249r
If it might please yo
r
L. among those that
yo
w
benefit, in graunting billes of discharge,
for their impost of wine, to allowe me for
as muche, as is s pent in my house, whiche is
neere about
e rate of three tonnes by
e yere,
that I send for out of
England,
I shall have
speciall cause, aswell for that, as I have for
other favors, to returne unto yo
r
L. most
humble thankes.
